title: Exposing Congressional Democrats’ Complete Government Takeover of Our Healthcare – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Healthcare	

Issued on:
April 10, 2019
We oppose efforts from Democrats to raid Medicare to fund socialism, robbing seniors of their benefits.
						President Donald J. Trump					RADICAL GOVERNMENT TAKEOVER: “Medicare for All” is a total government takeover of healthcare that will end private insurance as we know it, hurt seniors, and cripple our economy.LESSONS FROM THE OBAMACARE DISASTER: Congressional Democrats lied to the American people about healthcare once, and they are doing it again. REAL SOLUTIONS FOR AMERICAN PATIENTS: President Trump and his Administration have taken action to help ensure Americans have access to affordable, quality care and lower healthcare costs.
